tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: It was a very pleasant experience for me with Dr.Nikita.She was precise in her diagnosis and procedure ,completing all my dentistry work well in time.To add to my experience she was punctual at all appointments , and very affectionate and attentive too ! Thanks !

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited her clinic to get a crown for my front tooth and few esthetic fillings. She meticulously prepared my tooth, and worked tirelessly for the best creative solution to match the crown with other teeth. All procedures were entirely painless. The quality, naturalness and perfect fit, size and shape of the crown are truly remarkable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good dr. that i met for my treatment. As it was first experience, she made me comfortable ,that I was tension free. The experience was very nice,the equipments which she used were best. Well hygiene the staff were very friendly. I will recommend others also to come here and get the experience of it. Last but not the least the outcome was awesome and now I can smile freely. Now I show my smile very proudly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: DR Nikita is a very sweet dr ...... The way she treats isnreally gr8 with utmost care , so patient to explain all the reasons for the treatment . Thnks dr

tags: Value for money,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review: As mentioned the fees is not same. it's very expensive for x-ray n all check-up. They didn't even inform you about the resting fees. In end you will come to know.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Great experience. Doctor kept me relaxed & onformed throughout the time of my dental work. Very happy with Smile & Shine!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Nikita did my treatment painlessly and explained the issue in simple manner. Everything was hygienic and of good quality.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! Me and my staff were glad to treat you.
replier_name: Smile n Shine Advanced Dental Clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is friendly, explains issue properly, got relief from my severe tooth pain. Got appointment fast and on time.
reply_text: We are thankful for your feed back. Hope we keep improving.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Clinic is clean, with friendly assistant and attended promptly. My special thanks to Dr Nikita, who explained what was best for me ,made me comfortable as I was very scared at first. Overall very happy with my treatment.
reply_text: thanks for your feedback. keep smiling!
